member.name: T:PropGrabber
member.summary: A general purpose prop grabber. Works with only a transform for the raycast (like a camera). Optionally interacts with an IPropUser for custom behavior.

member.name: P:PropGrabber.RaycastSource
member.summary: The GameObject to use as the transform origin of the raycast for picking up props (e.g. a camera).

member.name: P:PropGrabber.PickupRange
member.summary: How far the grabber can pick up props from, in units.

member.name: P:PropGrabber.HoldDistance
member.summary: The distance from the RaycastSource where the prop is held.

member.name: P:PropGrabber.ThrowForce
member.summary: The force applied to the prop when thrown.

member.name: P:PropGrabber.MaxHoldVelocity
member.summary: The max velocity allowed before the prop is automatically dropped. Only matters if is true.

member.name: P:PropGrabber.MaxFovAngle
member.summary: The max angle (degrees) from the forward direction before the prop is dropped from being out of view. Only matters if is true.

member.name: P:PropGrabber.MaxMoveSpeed
member.summary: Increase to make the pop move faster. Decrease for smoother movement, but too low makes it move stubbornly.

member.name: P:PropGrabber.CanThrow
member.summary: Whether the player is allowed to throw the held prop.

member.name: P:PropGrabber.DropFromVelocity
member.summary: Whether the prop should be dropped if its velocity exceeds .

member.name: P:PropGrabber.DropFromAngle
member.summary: Whether the prop should be dropped if it moves outside the field of view defined by .

member.name: F:PropGrabber.RequirePropComponent
member.summary: Limits pickup to objects with a component.

member.name: P:PropGrabber.RequireTags
member.summary: Tags that the pickupable object must have in order to be picked up, like "prop". Leave empty to ignore requiring any tag.
